text: was a town in Miyako District, Fukuoka, Japan. On March 20, 2006 Toyotsu was merged with the towns of Katsuyama and Saigawa, all from Miyako District, to form the new town of Miyako. ==History== The ancient capital city of Buzen Province was near Toyotsu.Whitney, Willis Norton. (1889). A Concise Dictionary of the Principal Roads, Chief Towns and Villages of Japan, p. 177. ==References == == Other websites == *Toyotsu website Category:Towns in Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Toyotsu, Fukuoka
